case.title: Wealthy older man wants mutually beneficial with girl aged 18+ - REAL - 42 (London)
case.text:
Hi,
I am looking for a woman aged 18+ for a mutually beneficial relationship, non heavy casual, but I will treat you with respect and I'm not planning on seeing anyone else, but I'm a very busy guy with work.
I will treat you well and happily help and support you.
I'm real.
British, blue eyes, tall.
Please attach your photo and tell me about your self.
Thanks
